|brand = Zsun |model = SD106 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = WiFi Memory Card Reader |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 12/02/2021 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Zsun_WiFi_Memory_Card_Reader |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = Wi-Fi Card Reader, Wi-Fi SD Card |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR9331; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kc<!-- per bootlog --> |cpu1_type_rev = (v7.4) |cpu1spd = 400 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128FWPM; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9751G6KB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.31;LSDK-9.2.0_U11.14;
|exp_if_types = Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB (Type A)
|serial = yes,, 4-pad header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot |addchip = USB 2.0 Single Slot SD Card Reader;Genesys Logic;GL827L;;1;,,, <!-- 05e3:0723 --> USB High speed DPDT Analog Switch;Will Semiconductor;WAS7227Q;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 10.168.168.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = zsun1188 |defaultssid = zsun-sd7F0087FE |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt (unofficial)
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 02/2015 |estprice = 15 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00U70J1BM |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Atheros]]'' AR9331 @400MHz (MIPS 24K) *Memory: 64MB (DDR2) SDRAM @400MHz (Winbond W9751G6KB-25) *Onboard Storage: 16MB (SPI NOR) Flash, MicroSD card slot *WiFi: 150Mbps (802.11bgn) *Ports: 1x USB 2.0 (Type A) port for power
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/02/27/zsun-wifi-card-reader-adds-up-to-64gb-to-your-smartphone/ ''Zsun Wifi Card Reader Adds up to 64GB to Your Smartphone'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://wiki.hackerspace.pl/projects:zsun-wifi-card-reader ''Hacking the Zsun WiFi SD Card Reader'' on '''Warszawski Hackerspace'''] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/zsun/wifi-card-reader ''Zsun wifi card reader'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/zsun/wifi-card-reader |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = ? |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
